sentences.en: A nuclear reactor generates prodigious amounts of heat.
sentences.cn: 一座核反应堆能发出巨大的热量.

sentences.en: April bursts upon our Virginia hills in one prodigious leap.
sentences.cn: 四月不知怎的一跃,就来到了弗吉尼亚的小坡上.

sentences.en: Five hundred pounds would be a prodigious increase to their fortune!
sentences.cn: 五百镑就会使她们的财产增加许多了.

sentences.en: Five hundred pounds would be a prodigious increase to their fortunes!
sentences.cn: 对他们的财产来说,五百镑就将是一笔很大的收入了.

sentences.en: He impressed all who met him with his prodigious memory.
sentences.cn: 他惊人的记忆力让所有见过他的人都印象深刻。

sentences.en: His knowledge of music was prodigious.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐知识令人惊异.

sentences.en: It needed a prodigious amount of generalship to marshal these forces.
sentences.cn: 要统帅这些队伍,需要惊人的将才.

sentences.en: Laser discs can store prodigious amounts of information.
sentences.cn: 激光磁盘能够贮存大量信息。

sentences.en: Norland is a prodigious beautiful place, isn't it?
sentences.cn: 诺兰德是个特别美丽的地方 吗 ?

sentences.en: She was shocked by the prodigious view.
sentences.cn: 她对这奇异的景象感到震惊.

sentences.en: So let freedom ring from the prodigious hilltops of New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 所以,让自由的回声响彻新罕布什尔州连绵不绝的山头吧!
那位艺术家惊人的高产

sentences.en: The gulls which haunted the outlying rocks in a prodigious number.
sentences.cn: 数不清的海鸥在遥远的岩石上栖息.

sentences.en: These last words produced a prodigious effect on the seamen.
sentences.cn: 这最后的几个字在海员们身上发生了一种不可思议的影响.

sentences.en: This business generates cash in prodigious amounts.

words.tran_cn: 奇迹，奇事；奇才；奇观；预兆

trans.tran_cn: 异常的，惊人的，巨大的，庞大的，奇异的，非常的
trans.tran_en: very large or great in a surprising or impressive way
